TopicTitle: Can i made a thread for my {WSL} Pods\Body Series ?

Articles.Content:
{WSL} Pods\Body Series Alpha

This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license,

visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44604-WSL-Warsoul-s-Space-Labs-Under-Construction?p=571304#post571304

Coming Soon

I currently work to import a bunch of old models i made for another game into KSP. I know they look Sci-Fi but i made it in 2003. I import them for myself but i share them for who love that. Enjoy ! I have no textures at all !

Plz forgive me for that ! I'm not a criminal !)

There are some exemple of what's coming in the {WSL} Pods\Body Series. {WSL} Pods\Body Series are a part of the {WSL} Warsoul's Space Labs Expansion Pack and this thread was made to focusing on that part of that big project. For longtime logical purpose; i separate my threads by content types.

Currently, i'm stuck on a bug; http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/45847-I-found-a-new-bug-with-my-new-parts.

For now; i'm forced to convert my Pods into fuel tank or structural bodys. When i found what happen with my pods heading after a restart; i will integrate the pod into my parts for better visuals.

For more conventionals and realistics parts; they are coming after i imported all my old stuffs into KSP. All these thing was made arund 2003. Don't judge me or bash me plz for that. Some ship appear to have weapons on it but they are not implemented. They are purely visuals. It's easy to made cylinders tanks and they are already plenty of normals part in the spaceport. They have no needs for now. If you need somes models (keep it simple), you can draw a sketch of what you want and i can try to modelise it for you. The only thing i beg in exchange; is to put my credits and logo on it(coming soon). I'm here to help and i need help for textures for sure !

Edited August 15, 2013 by Warsoul

And here we go again...

Could we (at least) get screenshots of some of them in-game?
I'm certain these would look great if you textured them properly.

Didnt you JUST link all these in your hex can release thread??

How many threads for the same stuff do you need....1 dev thread and 1 release thread works just fine for everyone else....

I'd rather you stayed with one WIP thread, keeping two updated just gets messy and confusing.

And posting to just show your agreement is the same as just posting "+1" which the rules frowns upon, please avoid that.
